properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 3:16AM EST until January 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 7 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Port Clyde, ME to Stonington, ME
out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
